1.18.2.0.0.1: Added a basic and vanilla-style untransfur system to the mod. Introduced a custom Transfur Vision post-shader system, dynamically loaded via datapacks.
1.18.2.0.0.3:
+ Added Creature Diets
+ Added New datapack handle to add extra stats for any transfur
  * MiningSpeedMultiplier,RegenSpeedMultiplier,FlySpeedMultiplier,FallDmgMultiplier
+ Added Client Configs To turn off plantoids visibility from models
+ Added Dyeable pants and Laser Pointers
  * With Jei Info
